Title: The Host
Plot: A.D. Skinner sends Mulder to investigate a body which washed into the New Jersey sewer from the ocean. Mulder believes that the basic blue-collar assignment is punishment, but by Skinner's own admission, what he discovers is a true X-File.
GuestStars: Marc Baur, Matthew Bennett, Freddy Andreiuci, Don MacKay, Hrothgar Mathews, Gabrielle Rose, Ron Suave, Dmitri Boudrine, Raoul Ganeev, William MacDonald, Darin Morgan, Steven Williams
